display.title: Barrier Breaker Jewel
display.description: Combine a Runecarver's Jewel in an Experience Infuser with a stack of Emeralds, Amethyst Shards & Prismarine Crystals [Required: 1x Any Runecarver's Jewel 64x Emerald 64x Amethyst Shard 64x Prismarine Crystals | Drop Craft With: Experience Infuser]
